card1.desc: Training, Analysis, and Development. We teach your team to use AI every day. We analyze your processes to understand where to implement AI, eliminate bottlenecks, and develop tailored solutions.

card2.desc: The AI agent for WhatsApp reporting. Prisma contacts the team and transforms voice notes, photos, and messages into structured data and weekly reports. Save 20 minutes per day per employee.

bluvacanze.challengeDesc: An archive of thousands of inactive contacts. A true commercial treasure, but impossible to manage manually.
bluvacanze.solutionDesc: An AI agent that initiates proactive conversations on WhatsApp, profiles the user, and proposes personalized trips.

dolomiti.challengeDesc: Reporting from construction sites was slow and chaotic. Lost voice notes, paper sheets, and administrative delays.
dolomiti.solutionDesc: This is where Prisma was born. The agent that transcribes voice messages and photos from the site directly into the management system.

restworld.challengeDesc: A constant flow of unqualified leads that slowed down the sales team, with response times that were too long.
restworld.solutionDesc: An intelligent filter active 24/7. The AI Agent analyzes responses and passes only concrete opportunities to the salespeople.

FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI services.

items.question: What is Martes AI and how does it work?
items.answer: Martes AI is a multidisciplinary team that helps companies scale using AI and automation. We create custom AI agents and intelligent workflows to speed up your business operations.

items.question: What services do you provide as an AI Transformation Partner?
items.answer: We provide process automation, WhatsApp AI agents, and operational reporting automation. Our goal is to reduce manual tasks and increase efficiency for your business.

items.question: How will a WhatsApp AI Agent benefit my business?
items.answer: Based on our success stories, our AI agents have generated significant revenue (e.g., €82,271 in a month for Bluvacanze). It provides 24/7 customer support and helps qualify leads automatically.

items.question: How long does it take to get a custom solution?
items.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of the project. However, we can often implement initial automations within a few weeks to start relieving pressure from your team.

items.question: How can I start discussing my project with you?
items.answer: It's simple! Click the 'Book a Call' button on our site to schedule a meeting or fill out our contact form. Our team will analyze your project and get back to you quickly.

title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures relative to the collection, use, and disclosure of information when using the Service and explains the privacy rights and how the law protects them.
consent: We use Your personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

sections.heading: Interpretation and Definitions
sections.text: Words whose initial is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or plural.
sections.definitionsSubText: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:
definitions: **Account** means a unique account created to allow You access to our Service or parts of it.
**Affiliate** means an entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with a party.
**Company** (referred to as 'the Company', 'We', 'Us' or 'Our') refers to Martes AI.
**Cookies** are small files placed on Your device.
**Device** means any device that can access the Service.
**Personal Data** means any information relating to an identified or identifiable individual.
**Service Provider** means any natural or legal person who processes data on behalf of the Company.
**Website** refers to Martes AI, accessible from https://www.martes-ai.com/
**You** indicates the individual accessing or using the Service.

sections.heading: Collection and Use of Your Personal Data
sections.text: While using our Service, we may ask You to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include:

extraSections.title: Usage Data
extraSections.content: Usage Data is collected automatically during the use of the Service. It may include IP address, browser type, pages visited, date and time, and device identifiers.

extraSections.title: Tracking Technologies and Cookies
extraSections.content: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies.
extraSections.footer: For more information, visit our Cookie Policy.

sections.heading: Use of Your Personal Data
sections.text: The Company may use Personal Data to:
list: Contact You via email or other channels.

sections.heading: Data Retention
sections.text: We will retain data only for the time necessary for the stated purposes and to fulfill legal obligations.
sections.subText: Data is processed at the Company's offices and may be transferred to computers outside Your jurisdiction, always ensuring adequate security.

sections.heading: Changes to the Privacy Policy
sections.text: We may update our Privacy Policy. We will inform of changes on this page.
sections.subText: For questions about the Privacy Policy:
